00001 #ifndef INCLUDE_SOCKET_HPP
00002 #define INCLUDE_SOCKET_HPP
00003 
00004 #include <unistd.h>
00005 #include <iostream>
00006 
00012 struct Socket {
00013    
00014    int fd_;   
00015    
00017    Socket() : fd_(0) {}
00018    
00021    ~Socket() { 
00022       std::cerr << "close(" << fd_ << ")\n";
00023       close(fd_); 
00024    }
00025    
00030    Socket& operator=( int v ) { fd_ = v; return *this; }
00031    
00035    operator int() const { return fd_; }
00036 };   
00037 
00038 
00050 template <typename T> bool operator==( const Socket& s, const T& v ) {
00051   return s.fd_ == v;
00052 }
